column3: Code Review utACK feaea7001fdec6c0ec5ef6cc1b33cb214131ce25.\nAnd yes, I think we should unify `InitParameterInteraction` and AppInitParameterInteraction() to avoid confusion (can be done in a later PR).\n
@laanwj I don't think you're setting `fServer` correctly.  I think you need to move the `SoftSetBoolArg("-server", true)` to before `AppInitParameterInteraction`.

> @laanwj I don't think you're setting fServer correctly. I think you need to move the SoftSetBoolArg("-server", true) to before AppInitParameterInteraction.\n\nThere isn't any parameter interaction based on `-server`, so I don't think this makes a difference in practice. It'd be more logical to move it though, so I will.

@laanwj `fServer` gets set in `AppInitParameterInteraction`.  I compiled this PR and ran `src/bitcoind -daemon` and was unable to connect to bitcoind using bitcoin-cli.\n\nEDIT: Perhaps the right solution is to remove `fServer`

> @laanwj fServer gets set in AppInitParameterInteraction. I compiled this PR and ran src/bitcoind -daemon and was unable to connect to bitcoind using bitcoin-cli.

Oh you're right, sorry.
I expected the RPC tests to catch this but apparently they set `-server` explicitly.
```
qa/rpc-tests/test_framework/util.py:            args = [ os.getenv("BITCOIND", "bitcoind"), "-server", "-keypool
Yes I just meant get rid of the variable `fServer` since its used only once and in `AppInitMain` just check `GetBoolArg("-server", false)` directly, but either way.\n\n

> Yes I just meant get rid of the variable fServer since its used only once and in AppInitMain just check GetBoolArg("-server", false) directly, but either way.

Good idea. I pushed these changes:
- Initialize nRelevantServices in the namespace like nLocalServices (MarcoFalke's comment)
- Move `SetSoftBool("-server")` to before parameter interaction in `bitcoind.cpp`, in case someone adds
Any reason the default value was not assigned in the `namespace` (like `nRelevantServices`)?
